descriptions: Rewrote shop interaction system using ox_lib points for improved reliability and performance optimization
Added auto-detection system for Target scripts (ox_target, qtarget, qb-target) in Config to automatically configure the active resource
Fixed critical bug in Clothing Menu where female characters received incorrect clothing IDs (boxers/shoes) due to hardcoded male defaults
Fixed issue with shopkeeper Peds facing the wrong direction by correctly implementing vector4 heading support
Fixed ResetBlips runtime error ensuring map blips are correctly refreshed on resource restart
